item.title: Trump Says He Asked Xi to Help End Ukraine War
item.description: President Donald Trump said he asked Chinese President Xi Jinping to help end the Russia-Ukraine war during a recent call the two leaders had.

item.title: Trump Threatens Foreign Nationals, Companies With Double Taxes
item.description: President Donald Trump reportedly threatened to undertake the retaliatory move of doubling tax rates for foreign nationals and companies.
